title:
Comment on "Charge pumping with strong spin-orbit coupling: Fermi
  surface breathing, Berry curvature, and higher harmonic generation"
abstract:
In their recent work [Phys. Rev. B 109, 184409(2024)], Manchon and Pezo
develop a linear (in magnetization) theory, in order to investigate high-order
harmonic generation (HHG). Here, we show that such linear theory cannot
describe HHG, which, by definition is a nonlinear process.
